code: import{useState,useCallback}from"react";import{textToSpeechAPI}from"../services/text2SpeechAPI";export default function useTextToSpeech(){const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const[audioCached,setAudioCached]=useState("");const speak=useCallback(async function(text){setIsLoading(true);if(!audioCached||audioCached.text!==text){const audioData=await textToSpeechAPI(text);setAudioCached(audioData);playAudio(audioData);}else{audioCached.play();}setIsLoading(false);},[audioCached]);function playAudio(audioData){const audioBlob=new Blob([Uint8Array.from(atob(audioData),c=>c.charCodeAt(0))],{type:"audio/mp3"});const audioUrl=URL.createObjectURL(audioBlob);const audio=new Audio(audioUrl);if(!audioCached)setAudioCached(audio);audio.play();}return{isLoading,speak};}
